name: Tiny Invasion (Post BTP jam)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS(Not required to read):

Player1(Human):

Leftarrow/Rightarrow - Movement, Leftclick -  Shoot

Objective: Kill Player2(Alien) by shooting him/her once he/she is within the atmosphere.

Player2(Alien):

A/D - Movement, S - Abduct, Q - Deploy bot, W - Cancel abduction

Objective: Abduct all 3 cows without getting killed by Player1(Human)
